purpose: The email announces a 2-year postdoctoral researcher position at the University of Southern Denmark in the Software Engineering section of the Maersk Mc-Kinney Moller Institute. The successful candidate will work on the Nudge2Green research project, focusing on developing AI-driven digital nudging tools to promote sustainable food choices. The position requires collaboration with various external partners and emphasizes the importance of research in software engineering and artificial intelligence. The application deadline is set for June 10, 2025, and the role offers a supportive research environment with opportunities for professional development.
